Name: The Demon's Toll
Text: A Lesser demon blocks your way. '100 gold to pass,' it growls simply.  It doesn't look like there's another way around.

Choices.Text: Uh, sure. Here you go. [100 Gold]

Outcomes.Text: The demon grunts in... disappointment? But it steps out of your way nonetheless.
The demon smiles in satisfaction as its fire bursts to life
